tagline.title: KINTAMANI ULUWATU TOUR IS ONE DAY TOUR WE CREATED TO ENJOY SEE THE VIEW OF MOUNT BATUR VOLCANO AND THEN VISITING THE BEAUTIFUL ULUWATU TEMPLE
tagline.text: KINTAMANI ULUWATU TOUR IS ONE DAY TOUR WE CREATED TO ENJOY SEE THE VIEW OF MOUNT BATUR VOLCANO AND THEN VISITING THE BEAUTIFUL ULUWATU TEMPLE
tagline.html: KINTAMANI ULUWATU TOUR IS ONE DAY TOUR WE CREATED TO ENJOY SEE THE VIEW OF MOUNT BATUR VOLCANO AND THEN VISITING THE BEAUTIFUL ULUWATU TEMPLE

description.text: Bali Kintamani and Uluwatu Tour is the Bali Full Day Tour Packages we created by combine two amazing tourist destination in single day, this kintamani uluwatu tour will enjoy visit the stunning volcano view at kintamani and then visit the beautiful uluwatu temple, A very impressive one-day tour, where you can visit the view of Mount Batur from Kintamani Penelokan village, and end with seeing the sunset at Uluwatu Temple. This tour combination is perfect for those of you who want to feel a different sensation in doing the tour, first we will watch the barong and keris dance with a duration of one hour of performance, where the story of this barong dance is a fight about good against evil, continued by car and heading to Tegalalang village to see the beautiful view of the rice fields with terraces that are often very beautiful, enjoy the cool atmosphere in the rice fields full of natural atmosphere, proceed to Kintamani village to see the view of Mount Batur and Lake Batur from a distance, this view is very enchanting once and truly the natural scenery is incomparably beautiful, and continued to enjoy lunch at Kintamani, while having lunch, you can see the beautiful view of Mount Batur, after lunch proceed to Uluwatu, the trip may be a bit long, because of the distance from kintamani to uluwatu it's pretty good auh, arriving at uluwatu you can see the temple standing on a rock cliff with a height of 70 meters from the bottom, and it is very suitable to see the sunset view at uluwatu, then we will take you back to the hotel with a very impressive experience inside This one-day tour of Kintamani and Uluwatu accompanied by a very experienced and friendly tour driver will make the trip even more enjoyable

title.title: Barong and Keris Dance Performance | Kintamani Uluwatu Tour

image.title: Barong and Keris Dance Performance | Kintamani Uluwatu Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Barong and Keris Dance Performance is traditional dance about good and bad, Brong is the good charcater and Rangda is the bad character in Bali, the dance perform extremely well Balinese dance expert, take story from unended fight between the great and awful soul. Barong is a defender soul and Rangda is destroyer soul. Barong figured with magnificent fanged cover and long mane, he is the enemy of Rangda the witch, who controls over the spirits of lack of definition. The Barong is regularly depicted joined by two monkeys. Barong is depicted as a lion with red head, secured in white thick hide, and wearing overlaid gems beautified with bits of mirrors.

The Barong is regularly depicted joined by two monkeys. Barong is depicted as a lion with red head, secured in white thick hide, and wearing overlaid gems beautified with bits of mirrors.

title.title: Tegalalang Rice Terrace | Kintamani Uluwatu Tour

image.title: Tegalalang Rice Terrace | Kintamani Uluwatu Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tegalalang Rice Terrace is the beautiful rice terrace tourist attraction located in hill bank with spectacular view of rice paddy. Is popular tourist destination in northern Ubud village, due the location is very strategic in middle of Kintamani and Ubud village. Tegalalang forms the three most splendid terraced landscapes in Ubud's shared region, with the others being in the villages of Pejeng and Campuhan. Tegalalang Rice Terrace is sometimes to be icon of agriculture tourism for Bali and Ubud where now it was quickly developing into famous tourist destination.
description.html: Tegalalang Rice Terrace is the beautiful rice terrace tourist attraction located in hill bank with spectacular view of rice paddy. title.title: Kintamani Village for Mount Batur Volcano View | Kintamani Uluwatu Tour
title.text: Kintamani Village for Mount Batur Volcano View
title.html: Kintamani Village for Mount Batur Volcano View

image.title: Kintamani Village for Mount Batur Volcano View | Kintamani Uluwatu Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Kintamani Village is a name of completely open found in the slant and the sublime presentation envelop it. We can see brilliant scene from Kintamani Village to graph the element plenitude of Batur Mount and wide Lake of Batur in a valley. It is orchestrated in the level extent with cool atmosphere include it. When we stay up at Kintamani, we will have the ability to see the natural zone which is close to the lake. We can watch stunning trademark scene of Penelokan, a mix of Mount Batur and the spread of dull rock with Lake Batur and on a blue caldera.

image.title: Uluwatu Temple | Kintamani Uluwatu Tour | Bali Golden  Tour

description.text: Uluwatu Temple is a Balinese sea temple in Bali. Built in the 11th century, it is one of nine directional temples meant to protect Bali from evil spirits. The last tourist attraction we visited in this Kintamani Uluwatu Tour It is located in Pecatu village, Kuta South District of Badung Regency of Bali. Even more remarkable than the temple itself is its location, perched on a steep cliff 70 metres above the roaring Indian ocean waves. There are more steep headlands on either side and sunsets over Uluwatu are a sight to behold. The temple is inhabited by large numbers of monkeys, They are believed to guard the temple from bad influences.
description.html: Uluwatu Temple is a Balinese sea temple in Bali. Built in the 11th century, it is one of nine directional temples meant to protect Bali from evil spirits. The last tourist attraction we visited in this Kintamani Uluwatu Tour It is located in Pecatu village, Kuta South District of Badung Regency of Bali. Even more remarkable than the temple itself is its location, perched on a steep cliff 70 metres above the roaring Indian ocean waves. The temple is inhabited by large numbers of monkeys, They are believed to guard the temple from bad influences.

price.title: Kintamani and Uluwatu Tour Price :
price.content:
Kintamani and Uluwatu Tour Price :

The tour we provide is Based on Private Tour (no sharing), We offer two price you can choose which is Regular Tours Price and Inclusive Tours Price, Please see below the details of Bali Kintamani Uluwatu Tour Packages price :

Regular Tours Price :

IDR 650,000/car ( 1 till 6 person included)
IDR 950,000/minibus ( 1 till 12 person included)
IDR 1,250,000/minibus ( 1 till 17 person included)
IDR 2,500,000/bus ( 1 till 30 person included)
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + English Speaking Driver
Note : Parking Fee, Entrance fee and Lunch is not include in the price

Or

Inclusive Tours Price :

IDR 750,000/person
Note : For Inclusive Price is minimun Booking 2 Person
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + Parking Fee, English Speaking Driver + Entrance Fee + Ticket Barong Dance Performance + Lunch Indonesian Food + Mineral Water

content.event: Watching Barong and Keris Dance Performance
Visit Tegalalang Rice Terrace
Visit Kintamani Village for Mount Batur Volcano View
Enjoy Lunch in Kintamani with View Mount Batur Volcano

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • Regular Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price without include lunch and entrance fee, you need to pay by your own self
  • Inclusive Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price with include lunch and entrance fee
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
